q3: This is an initiative test, don't worry about this

q4.4-0: LEGISLATION, STANDARDS, RULES (e.g., agreeing new or changing rules or standards that others should comply with, new regulation, agreements, policies, economic instruments etc. including voluntary commitments).

q4.4-2: TECHNOLOGY and PROCESSES (new technical developments/innovation, e.g., research and development, new product design, new materials, processes etc., changes in practice, operations, environmental management and planning).

q11.11-0: Outcomes will be assessed once, when the initiative is completed

q12: Global Innovation Index, Research Development Expenditure, CO2 Emissions, Employment, Manufacturing Value Added

q14.14-0: Cost considerations (e.g., reducing costs of existing processes or of disposal)

q14.14-5: Media coverage, wide exposure of marine litter and plastic pollution

q14.14-15: Concern about potential human health impacts

q15.15-11: Gaps in expertise in member state/organisation

q15.15-7: Not enough support from within the member state/organisation
